org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.process
Interface IAeProcessStateWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeProcessStateWriter
public interface IAeProcessStateWriter

Defines interface for writing process state to storage.

journalAlarm

public long journalAlarm(long aProcessId,
                         int aLocationId,
                         int aGroupId,
                         int aAlarmId)
                  throws AeBusinessProcessException
Creates journal entry to recover alarm in the event of engine failure.

Parameters:
aProcessId -
aLocationId - The location id of the BPEL object that received the alarm.
aGroupId - The group id of the alarm.
aAlarmId - alarm execution reference id.
Throws:
AeBusinessProcessException
